The CEO hastily signed a message with a custom app using RSA signatures and a low exponent. Now, only 0xbacd8c086619516eebc19dbcfd1d9d7657e838bbc8d170bf119a93f8542112d3fd06973b9568db61321065d7789c6ba9eff9d422aafc0fe32bbed642d2aa794 remainsâ€”can you recover the original message?

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{fwtdkmpu}
ciphertext: 0xbacd8c086619516eebc19dbcfd1d9d7657e838bbc8d170bf119a93f8542112d3fd06973b9568db61321065d7789c6ba9eff9d422aafc0fe32bbed642d2aa794

hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
